column4: flash is making firefox freeze, i have most recent version. any ideas?
Unfortunately, I haven't found a concrete solution...you could try this...
Don't quote me here, but I'm pretty sure that Gnash doesn't play youtube videos
you could take a look at gnash, if that "fix" doesn't work
if you installed locally, I guess you could just remove the .so file found in /home/yournamehere/.mozilla/plugins
move the file to the desktop and then do a "about:plugins" in firefox...you'll see that firefox no longer thinks flash is installed.
you could try gnash now...the open-source alternative
i'm about to compile gnash and see how it performs
in all honesty, i've never tried it
i'll let you know how gnash turns out...
for me yes...it's the only thing that's caused me problems with linux
